registry.comment: DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY! This file was generated using [generator](https://github.com/Cvelth/vkma_xml_generator). Generated files are licensed under [The Unlicense](https://unlicense.org). The generator itself is licensed under [MIT License](https://www.mit.edu/~amini/LICENSE.md).

This file was generated from xml 'doxygen' documentation for [vkma_bindings.hpp](https://github.com/Cvelth/vkma_bindings/blob/main/include/vkma_bindings.hpp) header. Headers used for name lookup: [vk_mem_alloc.h (VulkanMemoryAllocator)](https://github.com/GPUOpen-LibrariesAndSDKs/VulkanMemoryAllocator/blob/master/src/vk_mem_alloc.h) [vulkan_core.h (Vulkan-Headers)](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Headers/blob/master/include/vulkan/vulkan_core.h)
It is intended to be used as [vulkan-hpp fork](https://github.com/Cvelth/vkma_vulkan_hpp_fork) generator input. The goal is to generate a [vulkan-hpp](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/Vulkan-Hpp/blob/master/vulkan/vulkan.hpp) compatible header - a better c++ interface for VulkanMemoryAllocator.

platform.name: does_not_matter
platform.comment: Why am I even required to specify this?

types.comment: Why is a comment here required?!
types.type: typedef void(*PFN_vkmaAllocateDeviceMemoryFunction)(VkmaAllocator allocator, uint32_t memoryType, VkDeviceMemory memory, VkDeviceSize size, void *pUserData);
typedef void(*PFN_vkmaFreeDeviceMemoryFunction)(VkmaAllocator allocator, uint32_t memoryType, VkDeviceMemory memory, VkDeviceSize size, void *pUserData);

enums.name: API Constants
enums.comment: Hardcoded constants - not an enumerated type, part of the header boilerplate
